item.title: Easy Coconut Laddu
item.description: Coconut laddus are a traditional Indian sweet, often made for festive occasions. They're easy to make and taste delicious. As the name suggests, one of the main ingredients used is coconut, so these are often a favourite for anyone who loves coconut.
